text: Ye Zhao () was a KMT general from Guangdong. He graduated from the Baoding Military Academy in 1919. In 1937, he fought at the Battle of Shanghai. He commanded the 21st group in November 1939 and was detained in April 1940 following the army's loss at Kunlun Pass. In 1949, he went to Hong Kong and later settled in Taiwan. ==References== Category:National Revolutionary Army generals from Guangdong Category:1892 births Category:Year of death missing
title: Ye Zhao
